title: Typophile tee review format
content: anybody else find the review format for looking at the tees cumborsome or am i just lazy? it seems like if we could make comments right after the shirt we want to comment on would make more sense than noting some number and scrolling back up to see which one they're talking about. either that or at least name the entries so it's easy to know what they're talking about without having to go back. just a suggestion, guess i should have made it earlier but i'm late to this game.
author: anonymous
